Cake Recipe

Bake beautiful cakes for Chris P in Grow a Garden

Difficulty

Easy

Cooking Time

‚è±Ô∏è 5 minutes 55 seconds

Pot Color

üç≥ Teal or Lemon Yellow

Ingredients

7 combinations

Ingredients

2x Corn, 2x Strawberry‚úì
2x Blueberry, 1x Corn, 1x Tomato‚úì
2x Banana, 2x Strawberry, 1x Pumpkin‚úì
2x Corn, 2x Watermelon‚úì
2x Corn, 2x Banana, 1x Watermelon‚úì
1x Blueberry, 1x Grape, 1x Apple, 1x Corn‚úì
2x Tomato, 2x Banana‚úì

Instructions

1

Go to Chris P's Kitchen in the main plaza

2

Add the required ingredients to the cooking pot

3

Start the cake baking process

4

Wait for the cooking time to complete

5

Collect your finished cake

6

Present it to Chris P for rewards

Chris P Craving System

üê∑ Craving Pattern

Chris P loves cakes during dessert craving hours

Best Time: Evening hours for dessert cravings

üéØ Ingredient Strategy

Works well with Common to Rare ingredients

Pot Color: Teal or Lemon Yellow

Pro Tips

üí°

Cakes are perfect for beginners due to their simplicity

üí°

Use sweet ingredients for better cake quality

üí°

Great for quick rewards and experience

üí°

Ideal for learning the cooking system

üí°

Teal or lemon yellow pot color confirms cake

üí°

Cakes are perfect for birthday celebrations
